channel.title: Help please
channel.description: How do i make it so you have to be 99 of the stat to wear a skillcape. WHat file and where in it? thanks

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @kneistol kneistol
item.description:
@kneistol wrote:

help i got almost same problem but my problem is that i have to be 99 a skill to wear cape
like if i have fighted a monster and i got 87 hp left i cant wear the cape and the hp doesnt fill up

Read full topic

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

if (ItemName.startsWith("Bronze")) {

find that and add

if (ItemName.endsWith("Skillcape")) { return 99; }
Skillcape would be whatever the cape name ends with.

If you use DeltaScape then it’s probably in a totally different file, I don’t know but you can use Z-FileSearcher to find out.

Read full topic

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @Timelimit10 Timelimit10
item.description:
@Timelimit10 wrote:

client.java. depends on what method you are using. theres a premade boolean for such a thing. Honestly theres probably atleast one item in your source that already requires a certain lvl for equip. find one, search client.java for that item. add the cape id in that area.

Read full topic
